reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a double cabin for 1 night. The cabin had basic kitchen facilities & the bathroom facilities were shared. The location is just off the main road, but is very peaceful. The two dogs were very friendly, almost too friendly! The 'tropical' bathrooms were clean & there were outside bbqs that we could have used.
reviews.title: Small & friendly
